actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating the calendar week beginning April 21, 1974, as National Volunteer Week.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to issue a proclamation designating the calendar week beginning April 21, 1974, as "National Volunteer Week".

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating the calendar week beginning April 21, 1974, as National Volunteer Week.
